code: import React from"react";import{useSelector}from"react-redux";import{Link,useParams}from"react-router-dom";import"./styles.scss";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UserDetails=()=>{const{userId}=useParams();const users=useSelector(state=>state.users);const user=users.find(eachUser=>eachUser._id===userId);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"user-details",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"User Details"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Name:",user.name]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Email:",user.email]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Mobile:",user.mobile]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"buttons",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{style:{textDecoration:"none"},to:"/edit-user/".concat(user._id),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Edit Details"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{style:{textDecoration:"none"},to:"/",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{children:"Back"})})]})]});};export default UserDetails;
